Explanation: The only thing you need to know is text in a new line and separated with ',' is the same as double space was before the difference is it will be custom space now
And its exotic perk name not exotics armor name

For simple next line use 
 as berore and don't leave spaces before or after
Vanishing Execution:
Gain Invisibility on Powered Arc, Solar, and Void Melee Kill. (Longer on Finishers)
Heals for X on Powered Melee Kill. (Stronger on Finishers)

Invisibility Duration
Minor = 6 seconds (10)
Elite = 9 seconds (13)
Miniboss = 12.5 seconds (13)
Boss = 13 seconds (13)

Finishers while in a Stasis Subclass will grant you the benefits from this Exotic.
Bosses are not finishable.
Skittering Stinger:
Throwing Knife gains greatly increased tracking and a second bounce.
After 3 precision hits within 2.5 seconds: Gain Strengthened Throwing Knife
Follow-up precision hits increase duration by 5 seconds each.

Strengthened Throwing Knife grants 200% [100%] more damage with throwing knife.
Strengthened Throwing knife staggers unstoppable champions.
Landing a throwing knife hit removes buff.
Parting Gift: Dodging drops a Parting Gift that explodes and deals 120 damage over 7.5 meters with a 1(?) second fuse timer.
Hawkeye Hack: Only one shot per Golden Gun activation.

Grants 500% more damage to Golden Gun.
(37% more compared to Line 'Em Up x3)
Returns 33% of Super Energy on Kill.
Wraithmetal Mail:
On Dodge
Grants Wraithmetal Mail for 9 seconds.

Wraithmetal Mail
Reloads all weapons
100 Handling
100 Reload
50 Mobility
Increases Sprint Speed by 6.25%
Increases Slide Distance by 33%
Relentless Tracker:
Tracks enemies for 5 seconds after hovering reticle over them. Persists briefly through walls.
If enemy is below 30% HP: Grants 1.01x more damage per percent below 30%
(Eg: 10% HP left -> 1.2x damage increase)
Rapid Cooldown:
If sprinting:
100% Faster Grenade and Melee Recharge.
Regenerates 3.5% Class Ability per Second.
6.25% faster sprint on dodge for 10 seconds. Not refreshable.
Additive to Focused Breathing's 3% Class Ability per Second
Misdirection: Dodging within 15 meters of an enemy applies Misdirection.

[PVE] Misdirection disorients minors as well as elites for 5 seconds.
[PVP] Misdirection warps audio and removes radar for 5 seconds, as well as briefly blinding.
Misdirection also deals 1 damage on proc.
Vanishing Shadow: Regenerates 4.4% of Melee Ability while invisible.

Rat King: 6 -> 8 seconds (33% increase).
Vanish in Smoke: 7 > 9 seconds (29% increase).
Vanishing Step: 5 -> 6 seconds (20% increase).
Flawless Execution: 9 -> 12 seconds (33% increase)
Roving Assassin: During Spectral Blades: Restores Super Energy % on Heavy Attack based on the amount of Spectral Blade Kills.
Touch of Venom: Punch instantly casts Smoke Bomb if on full melee energy.
Standing in the smoke bomb's cloud grants Truesight for 3(?) seconds, allowing you to see enemy outlines through walls from up to 64 meters away.
Upgraded Sensor Pack: Radar remains active while Aiming Down Sights.
If crouched: Enhanced radar. (12 sectors instead of 6).
Cross Counter: If on Arc subclass: Receiving Melee Damage or Meleeing grants Cross Counter for 3 seconds or until hit.
Cross Counter grants 3x increased melee damage.
One-Two Punch's bonus is reduced to 80% if Cross Counter is active.
Illegally Moddded Holster: Grants bonus accuracy and handling when readying a handcanon among other benefits
Probability Matrix: 25% chance per enemy hit with Arcbolt Grenade to recharge your Grenade.
Arcbolt Grenades chain up to 5 times (from 4)
Light Shift:
Stais Sublcass Only
Replaces Dodge with Shift
Shift has a distance of 10 meters, and renders you completely invisible except for a trail for the duration of the shift.

Dodging grants Light Shift buff for 10 seconds.
[PVE] Light Shift increases damage to Slowed/Frozen targets by 10%, as well as 10% more damage to Arc Weapons.
Dodge does not recharge while Light Shift buff is active.
Spring-Loaded Mounting:
Readying sidearm on critical health:
100% [35%] damage increase until no longer critical.
Refreshes sidearm magazine. (Generates ammo if reserves are empty).
100 Handling to Sidearm Stow and Ready speed.
Beyond The Veil: Grants an extra Smoke Bomb Charge.
Cloaking allies grants 50% Melee Energy per ally.
50% [10%] Damage Resistance on any Invisible effects. Applies to teammates made invisible.
Scissor Fingers:
Grants an additional Melee Charge to Solar Subclasses.
Melee Charges are recharged simultaneously.
Mobius Conduit: Blocking with Whirlwind Guard doesn't consume extra Super Energy.
Can deactivate Arc Staff at any time to preserve a portion of unspent Super Energy.
Nightmare Fuel:
Melee hits refresh magazine.
7 second cooldown.
Sharp Edges:
Blade Barrage knife hits and final blows grant 'Super Regeneration' or something buff that grants X% super per second.
Duration depends on kills
New Tricks: Skip Grenades spawn 1 more drone (4 -> 5) and chase enemies much more aggressively.
Hits with Skip Grenades grant X% Grenade Energy.
Hydraulic Boosters:
Increased Jump Height Increase:
High Jump = 9 meters -> 12 meters (33% higher)
Strafe Jump = 8 meters -> 9 meters (10% higher)
Triple Jump = 6 meters -> 7 meters for First Jump (16% higher)
9 meters -> 11 meters for Second Jump (22% higher)

Jump Distance Increase: (Includes innate 6.25% faster sprint)
High Jump = 28 meters -> 33 meters (18% higher)
Strafe Jump = 26 meters -> 31 meters (19% higher)
Triple Jump = 31 meters -> 38 meters. (22% higher)

Increases Sprint Speed by 6.25%
Increases Slide Distance by 33%
Wish-Dragon Teeth: Enhanced Tripmine Grenades deal 1.14x more damage, have X% bigger radius, lasts 20 seconds longer (10 -> 30) and have X HP (Normally Y).
Ability Damage recharges 33% of Grenade Ability.
Fury Conductors:
Melee Hits grant stacks of Fury Conductors.
Receiving melee damage unleashes an Arc Explosion with a radius of 5 meters.
Arc Explosion deals 22% of your Melee Damage per stack of Fury Conductors.
Fury Conductors grants 33-55-70% damage resistance to melee depending on number of stacks.
All stacks disappear upon receiving melee damage or after 10 seconds of not Meleeing.
Auto-Loading Link: Refreshes 10% of Readied Auto Rifle/Machine Gun magazine every 1.5 seconds.
Transfusion Matrix: Arc Melee Kills fully recharge Melee Ability and begins Health Regeneration.
Knockout counts as Arc Melee Kill.
Reflective Vents:
During slide after sprinting for at least 1.5 seconds: 
Generate a 180Â° frontal shield that reflects damage and projectiles.
And Another Thing:
Grants an extra Grenade Charge. 
Does not stack with Top Tree Striker.
Bring the Heat: Fusion Grenades possess built-in Fastball and detonate on impact.

Kills with Fusion Grenades grant Grenade Energy.
25% for Minors | 50% for Majors | 100% for Guardians & Bosses.
Assault Barricade: Assault Barricade has halved health and duration, but enables you and your allies to shoot through it.
Survival Well:
Generates a Healing Pulse on Barricade Cast which heals both the user and allies.
Healing Pulse heals for the highest between 58 HP OR to 130HP over 12 meters.
Requires Line-of-Sight to allies.
Supers generate 1 extra Orb of Power.
Glorious Charge:
Gain an 100HP Overshield for 7 seconds.
Overshield Duration scales with Thundercrash distance, up to a max of 20 seconds.
Horns of Doom: Powered Void Melee kills grant 20% Super Energy,
Sentinel Shield's Shield Throws regenerate 10% Super Energy.
Linear Actuators: After sprinting for 1.5s, gain Linear Actuators for 7 seconds.
Linear Actuators applies Shocked for 2 seconds on enemy, which releases an Arc static charge that chains when another enemy is within 20 meters. Shocked is refreshed on chain.

Increases Sprint Speed by 6.25%
Increases Slide Distance by 33%.
Resolute: Casting Fists of Havoc grants Resolute.
Resolute is a 75HP Overshield that negates Precision Damage.
Overshield can be refreshed by unequipping and equipping.
Sunfire Furnace:
If on Solar Subclass
Faster Ability Recharge
0.9% Melee & Grenade Ability Recharge per Second.

If Solar Super is Charged.
Much faster Ability Recharge

Overflowing Light: On Ability Usage: Gain Empowered for other abilities.

While Empowered
Grants 1.3x more Ability Damage and 1.4x Barricade Health per stack.
5% Melee and Grenade Energy per Second
4% Barricade Energy per Second.
Double stacks are complicated, they can only work in specific orders (Eg: Barricade -> Melee).
Starless Night: Guarding with Sentinel/Banner Shield blinds enemies within 7 meters for 5 seconds.
Any Ward of Dawn that you create grants Starless Night, which gives a 65HP Overshield to any ally that enters.
Overshield persists for up to 6 seconds.
Enemies that enter your Ward of Dawn are also blinded for 5 seconds.
Glacial Guard:
Replaces Barricade with Glacial Guard.
On Glacial Guard activation: Grants Shielded buff and applies 40 stacks of slow to enemies within 7 meters.
Shielded buff lasts 20 seconds (refreshed on damage taken), grants 100HP overshield, prevents sprinting, double jumping, and sliding.
While Shielded buff is active, you cannot regain Class Ability Energy by any means.
Solar Rampart:
Summoning Barricade unleashes a Solar Wave that returns back to the barricade after 18.5 meters.
[PVP] Deals 100 damage.
Solar Kills refresh 25% of Class Ability Energy.
Jump Jets:
No In-Air Accuracy Penalty when Hipfiring in Lift.
Enables hipfire while in Lift.

Lift Duration in seconds:
High Lift: 2.6 -> 4  (1.54x increase)
Stafe Lift: 2.2 -> 4 (1.82x increase)
Catapult Lift: 1 -> 4 (4x increase!).
Dreaded Visage:
Heals Critical Health on Kill.
Regenerates X% Barricade Energy on Damage.

Kintsugi

Maxes out Sword's Guard Resistance, Efficiency, and Endurance.
Perfectly timed blocks heal for 80(?) HP.

Aggressive Frame Swords obtain 95% Damage Resistance.
Any other sword obtains 90% Damage Resistance.
Sword Energy does not decay from blocking damage or holding guard.
Biotic Enhancements: When Surrounded by 2 [3] enemies: Activates Biotic Enhancements.
Biotic Enhancements increases Melee and Super damage for 8 seconds.

1.5x Super Damage

Move at 90% your normal forward speed while blocking with Sentinel Shield

Grants Burning Fists on Melee Kill.

On Kinetic Precision Kill: Enemy explodes in an elemental explosion with a radius of X meters, of your currently selected Light Subclass.

Chaotic Exchanger:
On Grenade Charge: Grants Chaotic Exchanger.
Chaotic Exchanger grants 20% Damage Resist.

Grenade Hits return between 15% to 85% Grenade Energy.
4 second cooldown between proc.
Charged Vortex Grenade can proc twice if enemies get hit by the initial explosion and the last few ticks.
Conduction Tines:
Arc Abilility Kills grant Conduction Tines for 7 seconds. Stacks up to 3x.
Conduction Tines grant various bonuses.

At x1 Conduction Tines
1.5% Grenade and Melee Ability per Second | 0.45% Super Ability per Second.

At x2 Conduction Tines
4% Grenade and Melee Ability per Second.

At x3 Conduction Tines
6.3% Grenade and Melee Ability | 1.7% Super Ability per Second | 66% Slower Super Drain.
Super Drain does not affect Chaos Reach, but affects every other Super.
Rites of Ember:
Burns last X seconds longer and grant X% Melee Energy on Solar Burn DoT
Daybreak applies burning.

Solar Burns add Rites of Ember debuff, which amplify the damage dealt by Daybreak.
Only Daybreak projectiles, Igniting Touch, and Phoenix Dive work.
Cerebral Uplink: Highlights enemies below 33% HP in a red outline, and enemy guardians with Supers Readied in a yellow outline.

Passively regenerates 0.6% of Grenade, Melee, and Class Ability Energy per second.
(Stasis Grenades recharge at .45% Ability Energy per Second.)
Warlord's End:
Arc, Solar, and Void Melee Kills, as well as Finishers weaken (1.3x Debuff) and blind.
Duration and Range are dependant on Enemy Rank.

Enemy Ranks are Minor/Elite/Major/Boss.
Finishers add 5 Seconds to Duration. Bosses are not finishable.

Warlord's End.
Range: 10/15/20/25 meters, centered on wearer.
Duration: 5/10/15/20 seconds.
Finisher Duration: 10/15/20 seconds.
Finishers while in a Stasis Subclass will grant you the benefits from this Exotic.
Close Enough:
Chaos Reach recovers 10% Super Charge on hit. 0.75s Cooldown.
Effectively maxes out duration by 2 times.

Sprinting while above 80% Super Energy grants Topping off Chaos Reach.
Topping off Chaos Reach charges 4% of Super Energy per second.
Dynamic Duo: Holding Grenade Ability spawns a Sentient Arc Soul for 20 seconds.
Sentient Arc Soul shoots a longer burst of 5 bolts.
If the Sentient Arc Soul hits during a burst, gain X% Grenade Energy.
Standing in an Arc Soul Rift refreshes the duration of Sentient Arc Soul.
Vampire's Caress: Heal for X HP and constantly regenerate X HP/s.

Alchemical Etchings: While inside a Rift or Well of Radiance:
100 Reload with 0.9x Duration Scale to everyone inside.
While inside an Empowering Rift or Well of Radiance:

2.25x Range Increase.
This is a multiplier to effective range. Affects every weapon.
Chaperone oneshots at 25 meters without Roadborn
Absorption Cells: Weapon Kills with a Matching Subclass Element grant a buff, depending on whether Super is charged or not.

If Super is not Full:
Energy Siphon for 2 seconds. (Essentially a Cooldown)
Proccing Energy Siphon grants 3(?)% [+1.45%, totalling 4.45%) Super Energy.

If Super is Full:
Receive 6s [3.5] (+4 [2] per additional kill) of Absorption Cells, granting a 20% Damage Buff for weapons matching subclass element.
Absorption Cells caps at a 10 [6] second duration, but can be refreshed.
Grasp of the Devourer:
Melee hit applies poison. 
Poison deals up to 7.8x the total damage of Melee Damage.
Bosses take an additional 1.8x damage.

Initial Poison tick deals 18% of Melee damage, while the last tick deals 1.54x.
Each successive Poison tick deals 9% more damage. 19 ticks.
Poisoned enemies spread the poison on death on a 3 meter radius.
Thorn final blows (by bullet) spreads poison.
Abyssal Extractors:
Void Kills grant Abyssal Extractors for 2.5 seconds.
Maxes out at 20 seconds.
[PVP] Getting a double kill within 2.5 seconds maxes duration to 20 seconds.

hile Abyssal Extractor is active:

10% Super Energy per Kill, each kill grants 1.5% less from the previous.

Embers of Light: Dawnblade Kills spawn both an Empowering and Healing Rift on Enemy Death Location.

Throwing a Solar grenade while Sunbracers Ready is active grants Sunbracers buff, which grants unlimited Solar Grenades for 5 seconds.

Increases Slide Distance by 33%

The Fourth Magic: Energy Weapon kills grant stacks of 'Death Throes'.

Each stack of Death Throes grants 20% faster Grenade Recharge and 1.1x increased Grenade Damage. 
Max of 5 Stacks. Lasts 10 seconds.

4 Precision Hits within 2.5 seconds of each grants Aeon Weapon Haste for 5 seconds.
Additional Precision Hits refresh duration.
Additional Precision Hits refresh duration.
On Champion Stun, Mini-boss, or Boss defeat: Allies within 30 meters gain 50% Grenade and Melee Energy.
Aeon Allies additionally gain 10% Super Energy.
2 Precision Multikills drop an Orb of Power for allies.
